data.title: Joyalukkas plans expansion across global markets
data.meta_description: Is considering entering the U.S. market this fiscal
data.text:
Leading jewellery retail brand Joyalukkas plans to expand its retail network both in the domestic and international markets, with a foresight to open 10 outlets each year. Its stores are currently branched across markets in India, the Middle East, Singapore and Malaysia, totaling to around 90 outlets in 10 countries. Plans are underway to enter the U.S. market with the first retail store to open in New York, in the current fiscal, reports say. Expansion plans are also envisaged in India with the 91st outlet opened in Kolkata recently, reports say.

The brand thrives on offering quality, and a variery in its jewellery portfolio. Also, its pricing strategy of keeping process at attractive levels is another pull for the consumers according to the company, reports say.
